#id=1
#text=Books are invaluable tools that bring you on wonderful adventures .
#id=2
#text=Everyone should read as many as they possibly can !
#id=3
#text=The best way to do so is to borrow a book from the library .
#id=4
#text=When I borrow a book from the library , I first obtained a library card .
#id=5
#text=I did this by going to my local library , and speaking with a librarian , there I created an account with my name .
#id=6
#text=Following this , and following the successful attainment of my physical card , I began my search for a book .
#id=7
#text=In the old days I would need to use a card catalog , these days I can search through books on a library computer .
#id=8
#text=I search through many genres and types of books before making my decision .
#id=9
#text=I then write down the number of the book and begin my search .
#text=I find the matching bookshelves and then find the matching book number .
#text=Book in hand , I gleefully skip to the checkout , and check my book out with the librarian , making sure to note the time which I need to return the book .
